msbt.message: It's fun to see how someone's personality is revealed in their furniture choice and arrangement It leads to some verrrry fascinating discoveries, don't you think?I mean, just look at this place! It says so much about you, . It really does.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />I hope your bed is as comfortable as it looks, .<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />When it comes to selecting a bed, there are just so many things to consider! Is it soft enough? Is it firm enough? What is it made of? How long will it last? Is it the right size? If only picking the right bed was as easy as picking out the right pillow covers, .

I find watching television so relaxing. That is, unless I'm watching one of those terribly intense dramas. I get so wrapped up in what's happening to the characters It's as if I'm living out the drama myself! It's quite stressful, you know. But all I have to do is turn on a shopping program and my nerves are calmed.

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is a very nice one, isn't it?I don't know much about these things, but I can tell just by looking at it that you have good taste. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Audio equipment is always a stylish way to pull a room together. So, bravo, !

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />My dear, I'm pleased to see that you have a clock in this room. It's so nice to know that it's right now. <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />Yes, yes, island life is supposed to be laid-back and whatnot But the passage of time is important! I just wish more people took it as seriously as you clearly do, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Oh my, so you're raising ! Lovely! Tending to plants is commendable.<20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />They need plenty of water and sun. But did you know that plants also benefit from good conversation? It's true, ! Now, don't be embarrassed. Just go ahead and chat with it like you would a friend.
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />Your is sparkling cleanâ€”not a single streak or spot to be seen! It's almost as if you never use it,
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This is the centerpiece of your layout, is it?There's just something about it I can see why you'd want to show it off, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />This did you choose it based on its look, or based on how comfortable it is? <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />And do you choose people based on their appearance?! Or based on what's inside?! Oh dear! I don't know what got into me! I'm so sorry I overreacted, .

<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />! YOU play the ?! Why, that's music to my ears! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="6" />I confess, I have a fondness for those who can play an instrument. It is such an admirable skill. Well, I can't help but look at you differently now, .
Your is quite lovely. You certainly have excellent taste. The culinary arts are an admirable pursuit. I only wish I had more time to spend in the kitchen.

Are you the sporting type? <20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" />You must be, since you have your own . Maybe I should take a page from your book and take up a sport. Let's see. Perhaps! <20_3 arg="6" /><20_3 arg="3" />No. No. Too much sweating. Perspiration is not one of my strong suits, .
<20_2 arg="10" /><20_2 arg="9" /><20_2 arg="10" />... Inside your home? How very unusual and -esque. It does add a clever accent to the room's decor. Yes, I think it's simply wonderful, !
